submission:
class Solution:
    def countSubarrays(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        answer = 0
        results = dict()
        for n in nums:
            if n < k or n & k != k:
                results.clear()
                continue
            if n == k:
                v = sum(results.values()) + 1
                results.clear()
                results[k] = v
                answer += v
                continue
            new_results = dict()
            for r, v in results.items():
                r_bar = r & n
                new_results[r_bar] = new_results.get(r_bar, 0) + v
            results = new_results
            results[n] = results.get(n, 0) + 1
            answer += results.get(k, 0)
        return answer
